transcript: I'm going to tell you the truth that people who are wealthy know that a lot of poor people don't it takes the same amount of effort sometimes more to close a hundred dollar sale as it takes to close a ten thousand dollar sale and it's not because of the product you sell but because of the prospect you're speaking with picking the right customer to sell to is one of the highest leveraged things that you can do to make more money because people have this false belief that it must be harder to sell those people or must be harder to deliver those people and we've all seen that Meme that says hey so what exactly am I going to be getting for my fifty dollars versus the wealthy client that says hey wire sent yesterday for 50 Grand what do you want to do next the faster you can learn that the faster you can get to doing the same work with just way more zeros
